thread.title: Jamie O'Hara 'confirms relationship with ex'
thread.title_full: Jamie O'Hara 'confirms relationship with ex' | Daily Mail Online

author: Lisa Mcloughlin
title: Jamie O'Hara 'confirms relationship with ex'
text:
He set tongues wagging over the status of his relationship with his ex-girlfriend during a romantic break to Dubai.
And now it appears Jamie O'Hara has confirmed his relationship with former flame Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney as they attended the House Of Mea AW17 show together during London Fashion Week on Sunday.
The sports star - who ditched Bianca Gascoigne three days after the CBB final - was in jovial spirits as he posed for photos with the stunning model, wrapping his arm around her toned waist.
Scroll down for video
Back on? It appears Jamie O'Hara has confirmed his relationship with former flame Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney as they attended the House Of Mea AW17 show together during London Fashion Week on Sunday
Cutting a stylish figure at the fashion event, he donned a pair of ripped knee skinny jeans which he teamed with a long sleeved top and knee-length wine coloured coat.
Looking at ease on the FROW, Elizabeth was sure to turn heads as she flashed her taut stomach in a tummy teasing cutout crop top, offsetting her olive green trench over her shoulders.
She continued her figure-flaunting display as she slipped into a pair of skintight capri length leggings, elongating her petite frame with a strappy heeled sandal, while looking at ease in Jamie's company.
MailOnline have contacted Jamie O'Hara's reps for comment.
At ease: The sports star - who ditched Bianca Gascoigne three days after the CBB final -appeared in jovial spirits as he posed for photos with the stunning model, wrapping his arm around her toned waist
Jamie's beaming appearance comes after he split with Bianca Gascoigne three days after leaving the Borehamwood bungalow, insisting he wanted to focus on his family rather than strike up a relationship.
However since the break, the footballer jetted off with stunning model Elizabeth-Jayne, who he split from last year, to Dubai, sharing a number of sweet snaps.
Sources claimed the pair had remained close, even as he went on the Channel 5 show and struck up a romance with Bianca, who he unceremoniously dumped following their CBB fling, revealing she was left 'a mess' because of it.
A good looking pair: Jamie appears to have confirmed his reunion with his ex-girlfriend on a romantic break in Dubai - after dumping Bianca Gascoigne following their CBB fling
Jamie and Bianca enjoyed a fleeting romance in the CBB house yet she was unceremoniously dumped when they headed to the outside world.
She will undoubtedly be heartbroken to see Jamie's Snapchat picture posted on Saturday, in which he cosied up to his stunning ex - seemingly confirming their reunion.
The father-of-three spoke out to reveal he is trying to make things work with Elizabeth-Jayne - and confessing that he accessed the situation with Bianca and decided not to get pursue her any further.
He wrote on Twitter: 'The reason I left it with Bianca was because after I got out and sat down and looked at the whole situation I realised that it wasn't for me, I have a lot going on in my life and she had a boyfriend and he was devastated about the situation.
'A man can try': Jamie confirmed he is trying to woo his ex-girlfriend on a romantic break in Dubai - after dumping Bianca following their CBB fling
'I didn't know the full extent of the situation until I got out and saw everything, as a man I didn't think it was the right thing to do, I didn't do anything wrong I didn't make any gain out of it.
'As for my ex we split up a while ago, I reached out to her because I realised she's an incredible person and having time apart made me realise what an amazing woman she is and I was lucky to have her in my life. Will she be with me again? I don't know, but as a man all I can do is try.'
Rumours surfaced earlier this week suggesting Jamie had been with Elizabeth all along.
Heating up - again: The footballer has jetted off with stunning model Elizabeth-Jayne Tierney, who he split from last year
Diving back in: Now the father-of-three has spoken out to reveal he is trying to make things work with Elizabeth-Jayne
A source tells MailOnline: 'Jamie has been sharing Snapchat videos of him cosying up to Elizabeth on their romantic break.
'They remained close before his time on CBB despite claiming to have been broken up. It's quite hypocritical, especially because of his reaction to Bianca revealing she had a boyfriend on the show.'
Bianca was dating cagefighter CJ Meeks before she went into the House, but quickly forgot about their relationship when she declared she 'loved' Jamie.
'Weren't for me': Jamie confessed that he accessed the situation with Bianca and decided not to get pursue her any further because of her messy love life
Get romantic in lingerie by Ann Summers this Valentine's Day £26 Ann Summers embroidered bra

Buy now

If not then why not do a little bit of last minute online shopping, treating yourself (and your loved one) to some pretty lingerie to make this holiday go with a bang? After all, whether it's Valentine's or not every girl's underwear drawer could do with an update every now and then.
And look no further than Bianca Gascoigne for inspiration who has been posing up a storm in a variety of sexy looks from Ann Summers. This one is particularly romantic with its lush red embroidery on top of sheer black mesh, making it perfect for an amorous celebration this week.
So click (right) to snap up the bra now and you can find the briefs below too. Or shop our edit of similar lingerie from the likes of Topshop, Figleaves, L'Agent by Agent Provocateur and John Lewis.

She has since slammed the sportsman, insisting she was hugely 'disappointed' in him and blasting claims they had plotted a 'showmance'.
Jamie dated stunning model Elizabeth last year, claiming she was 'the love of his life' but the brunette beauty insisted they had gone their separate ways well before his time on CBB.
She had insisted during their relationship that is was the real deal after being accused of goldigging.
She said: 'Only ever speaking out about this once, and once only, never have I ever spoke about my relationship publicly to anybody or any press.
'Love of his life': Jamie is said to have been close with the model before the show despite splitting, but insists we was single at the time of CBB
Out in the cold: Bianca was dating cagefighter CJ Meeks before she went into the House, but quickly forgot about their relationship when she declared she 'loved' Jamie
'Before I met Jamie I was with a normal working man, me failing in love with Jamie as no relevance to his profession.'
She expressed her shock at being dumped by Celebrity Big Brother lover Jamie O'Hara three days after the finale.
And Bianca Gascoigne looked ready to escape the sudden demise of her recent whirlwind romance as she arrived at Heathrow airport in London on Thursday.
The glamour model stood out in a sea of jet-setters as she put on a sartorially savvy display in a chic red coat and towering thigh-high boots.
Heartbreak holiday! Bianca went on her own post-split break to Tenerife last week
The daughter of former professional footballer Paul Gascoigne looked sensational in the colourful ensemble as she made her way through the airport.
Bianca opted for a stylish white blouse under her statement red coat and also went for a pair of skinny jeans.
The reality star's blonde locks were styled in glamorous Rapunzel styles waves - framing her pretty features, which were accentuated with a heavy slick of liner and mascara.
The stunner harboured her in-flight essentials in a snakeskin print handbag as she wheeled along the rest of her belongings in a large suitcase.
Not expecting it: She expressed her shock at being dumped by Celebrity Big Brother lover Jamie O'Hara three days after the finale, insisting it wasn't a 'showmance' for her
Bianca cut a lone figure as she stopped for a lengthy phone-call before strutting off to catch her flight.
Meanwhile, speaking of her romance with Jamie in the recent CBB series, the beauty insisted she 'totally respected his decision', but claimed she was offended to find out they had split by reading about it on the internet.
Jamie - who has reportedly landing a modelling deal - was said to have had a change of heart about Bianca, and sources revealed on Tuesday that he wanted to focus on his family rather than strike up a relationship.
'I totally respect his decision, obviously children should always come first,' Bianca said in a statement to MailOnline.
'[But] it would have been more respectful to hear the news from him first rather than reading about it in the newspapers.'
Not handled well: Speaking of her romance with Jamie the beauty insisted she 'totally respected his decision', but claimed she was offended to find out they had split by reading about it on the internet
Not meant to be! Jamie was said to have had a change of heart about Bianca, and sources revealed on Tuesday that he wanted to focus on his family rather than strike up a relationship
Had it coming: CJ Meeks, who was with Bianca before she entered CBB, has claimed it's 'karma' that Jamie dumped Bianca three days after the finale
Sources told The Sun : 'They are going to remain firm friends but Jamie needs to spend time with his family first and focus on other things in his life...They had a great time in the CBB house but unfortunately it has come to an end.'
Prior to the split, Jamie, who shares sons Archie, six, Harry, five, and George, three with ex-wife Danielle Lloyd, was adamant he was unaware of the fact CJ Meeks was on the scene - after the cagefighter was seen looking bereft while CBB played out.
Jamie told The Sun: 'I didn't know she had a boyfriend. I wouldn't have done anything differently. Once that connection's there, it's hard to stop it.'
Meanwhile, CJ has claimed it's 'karma' that Jamie dumped Bianca three days after leaving the Celebrity Big Brother house.
Speaking to The Sun , CJ scoffed: 'It's come full circle. It's karma, isn't it.'
Exciting opportunity: Jamie is hoping to keep busy with a lucrative new modelling gig with fashion powerhouse Reem where he could potentially earn a ‘seven figure’ payout
However, Jamie is hoping to keep busy with a lucrative new modelling gig with fashion powerhouse Reem where he could potentially earn a ‘seven figure’ payout.
According to The Sun , fashion label Reem believe the former athlete 'fits their look' and Jamie is said to be 'over the moon' with the offer.
They added: 'He’s always had a hidden interest in clothing so this is definitely a direction he was looking to go in.
'Since leaving the [CBB] house he’s been doing a lot of partying and appearances in clubs but this will give him something to really sink his teeth into.'
From what the source says, Jamie seems to be looking for something to fill the void; he notoriously agreed to a contract termination from Gillingham FC, in September last year.
New career: According to The Sun, fashion label Reem believe the former athlete 'fits their look' and Jamie is said to be 'over the moon' with the offer
